cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Log__c.name: cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Log__c
cgc_sync__Sync_Mobile_App_Log__c.description: Stores the error messages and warnings that occurred in the mobile app. Such error messages and warnings are uploaded every time a user runs the upload to Salesforce action in the mobile app.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Unique identification of the mobile app log.

cgc_sync__Details__c.description: Link to the sync details record.

cgc_sync__DeviceId__c.description: Unique identification of the client device that was used to submit the event.

cgc_sync__Device_Model__c.description: Model number of the device. Note This field is for internal use.

cgc_sync__Device_OS_Version__c.description: Version of the operating system on the mobile device.

cgc_sync__Device_Platform__c.description: Operating system of the mobile device, including Android, iOS, or web browser.

cgc_sync__Generated_At__c.description: Stores the date and time when the event is generated.

cgc_sync__Length_In_Millis__c.description: Stores the time taken (in milliseconds) to generate the event.

cgc_sync__Message__c.description: Error log message that's used as the error description.

cgc_sync__Namespace__c.description: Namespace used for the mobile app. Possible values: FW UI FW ENGINE SYNC

cgc_sync__Sync_Id__c.description: Stores the unique ID of the sync request.

cgc_sync__Sync_Version__c.description: User who's logged in on the client while the record was submitted to the back end.
